name: Hunting Season
creator: Nugget
description: Welcome to Hunting Season! This custom campaign expansion comes with five custom scenarios that tell the story of a crazed hunter going after animal-themed villains for his own sense of morality. Each of the five new scenarios in this expansion features a new villain: Vermin, Scorpion, The Lizard, Vulture, and Kraven the Hunter.
epilogue: Kraven falls to his knees, revealing a prideful grin. 'It would seem I have become Kraven the Hunted! Thank you, heroes, for giving me the hunt of a lifetime.' Kraven collapses on the ground, and is later confirmed dead. The animal-themed villains are arrested, and the heroes reflect on the necessity of putting an end to Kraven's madness. Kraven the Hunter is defeated and the players win the campaign!

scenarios.name: Scenario #1 - Vermin
scenarios.description: The human-rat hybrid Vermin has come out of the sewers of New York City and brought with him a giant swarm of rats. The NYPD and S.H.I.E.L.D. stand defenseless. Defeat him to force the rats back underground.
scenarios.introduction: Each player records their identity in the campaign log; players cannot switch identities. Hunter Mode Only: Put the Rabid Rodents environment into play.
scenarios.resolution:
Victory: Each player earns 3 Experience. Earn 1 bonus XP if not engaged with rat minions and 1 bonus XP if the main scheme is on stage 1. One player adds the Vermin ally to their deck. Hunter Mode Only: Earn 1 additional XP.

Loss: New York is quarantined. Vermin escapes. Each player earns 2 XP, plus 1 if not engaged with rat minions. Record that Vermin escaped.

scenarios.name: Scenario #2 - Scorpion
scenarios.description: Scorpion is seeking revenge against J. Jonah Jameson Jr. We need you to defeat Scorpion before he gets his pincers in Mr. Jameson.
scenarios.introduction: Each player may spend 2 XP to increase starting hand size by 1. Expert Campaign: Set HP to remaining values. Spend XP to heal 1 per XP or add a random obligation to heal to full. Hunter Mode Only: Put the Sting of the Scorpion environment into play.
scenarios.resolution:
Victory: Each player earns 3 Experience. Earn 1 XP if Jameson has 1 or no wound counters, and 1 XP if the Scorpion's Tail is set aside. Scorpion ally joins the player with the least predator allies. Hunter Mode Only: Earn 1 additional XP.

Loss: Scorpion kills Jameson. Each player earns 2 XP, plus 1 if the Tail is set aside. Each player must remove 1 hero-specific card from their deck.

scenarios.name: Scenario #3 - Lizard
scenarios.description: Dr. Curtis Connors is losing control to his reptile side. 'Please come and help me before I hurt anyone.'
scenarios.introduction: Each player may spend 2 XP for +1 setup hand size. Expert Campaign: Rules for HP/Soin as per scenario 2. Hunter Mode Only: Put the Cold-Blooded environment into play.
scenarios.resolution:
Victory: Each player earns 3 Experience. Earn 1 XP if on stage 1 or 2 of main scheme, and 1 XP if Lizard has less than 1 reptile attachment per player. Lizard ally joins the player with the least predator allies.

Loss: Curtis Connors is gone. Each player earns 2 XP + bonuses. Record that Lizard escaped and remove 1 hero-specific card from deck.

scenarios.name: Scenario #4 - Vulture
scenarios.description: Vulture swoops through your window and drops you on the asphalt before causing mayhem. Gather info to find the mastermind.
scenarios.introduction: Each player may spend 2 XP for +1 setup hand size. Expert Campaign: Usual HP/Soin rules. Hunter Mode Only: Put the Aerial Excellence environment into play.
scenarios.resolution:
Victory: Each player earns 3 Experience. Earn 1 XP if at 50% HP or more, and 1 XP if threat is less than 7 per player. Vulture ally joins the player with the least predator allies. Gibbon is added to the Lodge.

Loss: Vulture flies away, but you attach a GPS tracker. Each player earns 2 XP + bonuses.

scenarios.name: Scenario #5 - Kraven the Hunter
scenarios.description: Kraven has been triggering feral instincts in others. Now, you are his ultimate prey. Sergei Kravinoff stands ready for the final hunt.
scenarios.introduction: If Vermin or Lizard escaped, add their minions. If Scorpion or Vulture joined, remove their minions. Kraven uses a Trap Deck. Spend 2 XP for +1 setup hand size. Expert Campaign: Usual rules. Hunter Mode Only: Put the Master Trapper environment into play.
scenarios.resolution:
Victory: Kraven is defeated and the players win the campaign!

Loss: The last thing you hear is a thundering KRA-KOOOMMM!!! The players lose the campaign...
